text: inerisuni mak’inati be’ānite layi yelebihimi፡፡ gini ālahi yemīshawini sewi yak’enali፡፡ kegenizebimi yemitilegisuti (minidawi) lenefisochachihu newi፡፡ ye’ālahinimi fīti (widētawini) lemefelegi inijī ātilegisumi፡፡ kegenizebimi yemitilegisuti hulu (minidawi) wedenanite yimolali፡፡ inanitemi ātibedelumi፡፡
